function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited understanding of the link between building and occupant parameters and their impacts on physical, mental, and social health","Impact":"Ineffective assessment of occupant well-being and health impacts of buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research and large-scale field studies to understand the link and develop effective assessment methods","Technologies":"Data science, artificial intelligence, building science research tools","People":"Occupants, building scientists, health professionals","Owner":"Building management, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited generalizability and longitudinal studies in existing research on occupant health in buildings","Impact":"Inability to generalize findings and lack of long-term health impact assessment","Mitigation":"Conduct large-scale field studies and longitudinal research on occupant health in buildings","Technologies":"Longitudinal data collection tools, survey instruments, sensor technology","People":"Occupants, building scientists, research institutions","Owner":"Research institutions, building management"},{"Description":"Siloed expertise in building science community and lack of integrated understanding of lighting, air, noise, and temperature impacts on occupants","Impact":"Ineffective management of building environment for occupant well-being","Mitigation":"Develop interdisciplinary research framework, encourage collaboration and knowledge sharing among experts in building science, health, and environmental factors","Technologies":"Integrated sensor systems, data analytics tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Building scientists, health professionals, data scientists","Owner":"Building management, research institutions"}]}
